thread.section_title: Space City Drones Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Space City Drones | spacecitydrones.com
thread.title: Locke Bryan
thread.title_full: Space City Drones reviewed by Locke Bryan

author: Locke Bryan
title: Locke Bryan
text:
Jason did a great robin three ways:
1) Met me at the park when he was in town and gave me some hands on with the Phantom 4 Pro.
2) Kept me updated with the status of my order.
3) Is responsive to questions when I have them (I am a newbie).
Enjoyed the purchase experience and look forward to a continued relationship with Space City Drones!
